ModMetaData.name: Short Circuit Blues
ModMetaData.author: Blues
ModMetaData.description:
'sall about Short Circuits!
- Configure the power drain in short circuit events. - Use with RT Fuse and/or Power Logic for extra features.
v2.01 (Fire Update) notes: * Fixed power logic flicks for breaks. * New settings for fire, explosion, breakdowns and event letters. * Code cleanup and refactorings. * Settings menu fix and visual edits.
